fuck i hope there are no women this stupid in real life. how do you go from "my best friend is here too so i can feel at ease" to putting up with rape and not asking said friend to help. even if you are disappointed with her getting the other guy, its still no reason to allow a rapist to survive. hell, even without a "best friend" there, just shout for help and 50% of completely random people would still beat up the bastard so bad he won't dare even look at a girl anymore.

A Good Art, a Good Story of rape, a Good development, a Good start. I hope we can have the continuation of this story but well the author already said that it's hard to draw this one so I dont think we would get continuation. Honestly the story of almost NTR is so far the best story for me.
